message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. Hope we can make a deal!
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 is fair!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need at least 60% to make it worth it for me after the inflation. Let's try this offer.

Okay, I'm willing to go down to 55% to avoid further losses from inflation. Let's split it 55-45,  it's a fair deal considering the circumstances.
